website_summaries.verdict: Does a good job cleaning debris from outdoor hot tubs, fountains and pools, though some find the handle too short to reach all corners.
pros: Hot tub owners especially like the shorter handle and the width of the skimmer net
Works well for cleaning outdoor fountains
Owners like the price point and ease of use
cons: Aluminum handle is flimsy and doesn’t attach well to the skimmer itself
End cap tends to fall off easily
Some feel the handle is too short
Reports of net separating from rim after several uses

customer_reviews.title: This is a good pool net
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pool net. It feels a little cheaply made, as I could see this breaking over time. Its essentially just a blue net sandwiched between 2 plastic pieces held by 1 screw. Fortunately, things like this are easy to fix and I suppose its good to have plastic so you dont deal with rust. I mostly bought this due to its size. Its the right size for a spa type set up and every store I went to only carried full sized pool nets. This is about 24'' high so keep that in mind. Overall it was a good product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a hot tub - really happy with it - I use it to remove calcium flake and scale build up.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! A few people said the white cap was missing, but the one shipped to me had a white handle cap. It's perfect for my 250 gallon hot tub. I was getting some calcium flake build up and it was nearly impossible to remove because the filter was just getting super clogged up because of it - after about 10 minutes sweeping through the water I got like 90% of it out - much better! It does the trick just fine for a hot tub. Not sure it would be that great for a pool though! Ben
customer_reviews.author: Ben C

customer_reviews.title: Pool Skimmer - great for small spa or pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skimmer to use in a small spa. It works well and filters out the smallest debris. The only defect was the end cap on the handle was too large and fell off the first time I used it. I couldn't find it so I wrapped some clear tape over the end to keep water from filling up the hollow handle each time I used it. It's no big deal and I am happy with the skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose well, but...
customer_reviews.text: the white end cap doesn't stay on from the second I opened the package. I'm concerned it could contribute to rust or something if I use it without it, so I keep banging it on, hoping this time it will stay. Otherwise, like Mama Bear's chair, it's just right to skim the tiniest of insects that fly into my 66" diameter stock tank pool. Not too large, not too small. Gave it 4 stars because it's new and not sure how it will hold up. Plus, the end cap. Annoying, that, but I do recommend overall. well
customer_reviews.author: My account was compromised.

customer_reviews.title: Small, cheap materials, average price?
customer_reviews.text: Its small, around a foot and a half long maybe a foot wide. I thought it would be bigger for the price i paid, but thats my fault for not looking at the specs. I bought this for my kids small pool so it works for that but i was hoping to keep it for a larger pool. I guess its good for surface debris but it wouldn't be good for anything too deep. For the price youd expect a little more as if you doubled the cost you can get a deceny extendable model.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Handle is short but for a hot tub ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Handle is short but for a hot tub its perfectly fine. Mesh could be a little finer. Some of the little bugs that might get in hot tub sometimes go right thru. Like it but I am ordering another one with a finer mesh. Could use a hole or D ring in the tip of the handle so u can hang it up. Over all. Not horrible but could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: John m

customer_reviews.title: Netting is too thin and fragile - Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I misunderstood this product - I thought it was for a swimming pool - with a longer handle - not a short handle for a "spa". I laughed at my mistake and decided to keep it anyway. I was using it the first time and the netting broke. I scooped up a small plastic cupcake that you can squeeze water in it and squirt the water out. It is very small, it fits in a 4 year Old's hand and I would be surprised if it weighed 1 pound. The netting on this "spa skimmer" is extremely thin and fragile - a leaf would probably break the netting. I sure wasted my money. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Wilker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a hottub
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the perfect net for a hottub. We like to leave the top of the hottub end of summer/fall time frame during the day when we are outside so us and the kid cane hop in and out and so forth. Unfortunately this mean leaves and everything else can fall in or get brought in. For two years we had to buy pool nets unable to find the perfect size for the hot tub. This is about 12 inches, little hand skimmer. Floats or you can do a make shift side attachment to the hottub Netting can get tiny bugs as well as bigger leaves out
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lee

customer_reviews.title: These nets are great! We have used ones like this always
customer_reviews.text: These nets are great! We have used ones like this always, my parents use the same one on a longer pole for their pool, this one has a shorter handle maybe 2 ft... which is perfect for our little 10' x 31" deep pool. The net is flat to you just give it a shake and the junk come right off, rather then have to flip the net inside out hoping all the junk falls off!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a small skimmer to use when I'm in the pool and need to get a bug or leaf out without getting out and using the larger skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Taut screen keeps the leaves from falling back out.
customer_reviews.text: I reordered this after my dog ate the first one, and it's better than what I've seen locally in stores. I like it, because the mesh is very taut. In other words, it's not like a floppy bag that allows the leaves and debris to fall out. Usually, I just tap it on the side of the hot tub to clear out the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T.

customer_reviews.title: I love the small handle.. thought it was going to be to small but its the perfect size for the spa
customer_reviews.text: I love the small handle. I thought it was going to be to small but its for my spa and its a perfect size. I punched a hole in the end of the handle so I could hang it, thought it was weird it didn't have one already. Thought it was a little expensive for such a small thing considering you can buy the full size handled one for $20 but it does the job and its a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is not a net... I thought it would be a small version of my large pool skimmer. It is not. It is a flat piece with no pocket. It is simply a piece of netting across a plastic rectangular frame. It has worked really well for insects so far, but it’s not a net like my skimmer as I was expecting. It’s also not as fine as I was expecting. Still picks up smallish bugs.
customer_reviews.author: River Summers

customer_reviews.title: none of them last
customer_reviews.text: this item got my attention because of the handle length; otherwise, it's like all the rest...does what it should, and how long it lasts depends on how you use. The screen is effective because it's sheer. It can tear easily because it's sheer. Be care, don't let the kids play w/it and it'll last until the chemical wear it out.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality netting!
customer_reviews.text: Upon the first use two holes formed at the bottom near the handle in the netting. For the price I didn’t expect it to last long, but on the first use come-on. The white cap on the bottom of the handle falls off constantly also. If we were using it for anything more than a hot tub I would have sent it back. I won’t buy this again and don’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great slimmer net for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a smaller inflatable pool. We have a 10 foot 280 gallon inflatable pool and this little net is great for keeping it clean! Very sturdy and the mesh is thick, which catches the smaller debris that collects on the bottom of the pool. My only complaint is that the little white piece on the end of the handle pops off easily. I just put a few dots of super glue to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: Arhodes88

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for when you're in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This smaller sized skimmer is perfect when you are in the pool to clean up the top (or even bottom). It had to be replaced after my kids used it to retrieve a ball while playing volleyball that went through it. Otherwise, it was in great shape even after 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: RMmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Look at the details!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't look at the measurements. This is much smaller then it appears to be. It really doesn't pick up much compared to a full size one. Good for a kiddie pool or Jacuzzi.
customer_reviews.author: Cheekygurl29

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and I would recommend it. My only complaint and the reason I did not give it 5 stars is the fact that the white, plastic cap comes off the handle very easily and causes it to fill up with water.
customer_reviews.author: da_cheat87

customer_reviews.title: Small and short
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small net, and the pole is very short. I think it would be useful if I needed to use a net while sitting in the hot tub. But if I'm not in the hot tub, it is really difficult to reach with this short pole. The quality of the item seems fine, though the white cap on the end of the pole constantly falls off, so I just took it off and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This works on our hot tub but note the handle is very short. Almost too short for the hot tub. You have to go around it to reach everywhere. Also the plastic end on the tip of the handle fell off right out of the box. Wished there was a hook at the end so it could be hanged. Should get a retractable pole instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Great item but needs a longer handle
customer_reviews.text: I have a large kiddie pool on my deck with an Intek 1000 GPh pump. Its large enough to require the pump and a skimmer. The problem with the skimmer is that it really needs a longer pole. Other than that its a must for any pool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use in my blowup pool
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a net to retrieve bugs and debris from our blowup pool. We keep the pool covered, but junk still manages to get in the pool. This net is perfect. It's durable, a good size, and a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The skimmer is the perfect size and works great. The only bad thing is the little white cap at the end of the pole has fell off since day 1. Very aggravating, but can easily be fixed with some super glue
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor hot tub in a hard water state
customer_reviews.text: Find myself needing to sieve-out lots of hard water crystals in the soft-sided 4 person hot tub... and this lil shorty stick is just right for the size and depth of the tub. Lightweight, Just wish it has a hole in the handle that I can hook it on the wall with.
customer_reviews.author: bitofgrace

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Mine fell apart within a couple months. The end came off and the mesh started falling apart. Might just be a fluke, it's not like I was beating my hot tub with it, but it's unfortunate that it went in the garbage and will have to pay for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: E_Royall

customer_reviews.title: It's the leaves and bugs out
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I bought this to clean out my grandson's inflatable pool does the trick wish the handle was longer. Would have given at 5 Stars if the handle is longer
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: End cap had to be glued on
customer_reviews.text: While it does not impede the functionality, the end cap fell off immediately upon removal from the packaging. I didn't want to get scratched by the metal edge, so I glued it back on. I hope it stays.
customer_reviews.author: scuba traveler

customer_reviews.title: Working great with our blow up pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to skim bugs and leaves out of our blow up pool for the summer. Even our kiddo likes using it because it's the perfect size for his 6 year old body- one less chore I need to do now!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: I bought this thing for our 15000 gallon pool and should have known the price was too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this thing 2 stars out of generosity because I ordered Amazon’s choice without even reading the description. I bought this thing for our 15000 gallon pool and should have known the price was too good to be true. It’s a little larger than the size of my hand, it looks more like a lacrosse stick than a pool skimmer 🤣🤣 #fail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I wasn’t going to like this skimmer because it has a short handle but I only have a 8 ft by 30 in pool so it is actually perfect for it
customer_reviews.author: butterflydrumm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for cleaning out bugs and grass from the kiddy pool. It even stands up to the abuse my toddler gives it when she tries to help.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 years of regular use with my hot tub, the netting fell off from the plastic frame. Now it's going into the trash. Products like this should be built to last longer
customer_reviews.author: brendonius

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This works, it has a handy short handle which is welcome for a hot tub. Sadly, within 10 uses the screen began separating from the plastic edging rendering nearly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best hand net I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hand net I've found. The length is good, it's not what I'd call sturdy but stands up to frequent use over a year or so. Mesh is fine enough to pick up most small bugs and such, and it's good for bigger leaves etc. as well. I have a very fine net I reviewed as well, that's good for dust and tiny tiny bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L

customer_reviews.title: Pool Skimmer
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time. article as presented. Have not had long to use. Only problem so far is that the plastic tip cover on the handle is loose and comes off too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Small but sturdy and does the job for my above the ground swimming pool. Quick to take out the bugs and debris the wind brings.
customer_reviews.author: Braulio Castro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand-held skimming net for hot tubs
customer_reviews.text: Great net for a hot tub. You can sit in the tub or just right outside to scoop out anything floating without having a long and bulky handle. The weave is tight enough to collect even small particles. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: No holes in netting so you pick up everything
customer_reviews.text: I use for my small 12' x 3' pool. I just walk around with it and it picks up everything and when I turn it around to bang out what I picked up everything comes off easy.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA ACKERLY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect skimmer for me and my 7x10 therapy pool. I can easily sift off the tiny little lemon tree blossoms and other debris. I leave it next to the pool so I can grab it any time while already in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pool owner
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for smaller inflatable pool! Great skimmer to use while on your float and you want to get unwanted things out of your pool! Great value And shipped on time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our small pool that the waterfall runs in to. I added a little longer handle but it works well
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Keep It Clean
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have an above ground pond so it is nice not to have that really long pole. The shorter pole makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable, great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This works well. It's a little cheap and I don't expect it to be overly durable but it gets the job done. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great for our small pool
customer_reviews.text: We have an inflatable 8 ft pool and it is perfect for getting debris out of it. For anything larger than a shallow pool this will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: M.DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to skim a small pool and it works great. Nice big net so makes quick work of it. Two tiny issues: the white cap won't stay on the end and I wish it had a hole in the handle to hang it. All-in-all and great skimmer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kwallace

customer_reviews.title: great net
customer_reviews.text: this net is perfect for my small little pool. love that it grabs all the little debris.
customer_reviews.author: elle-aye

customer_reviews.title: Good Skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Quality of skimmer is very good. However, I wish the mesh was 'finer' as this doesn't pick up very small particles.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A

customer_reviews.title: finally a matching product for my hot tub
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect skimmer for a sundance spa. it is slightly narrower than the width of the filter compartment. i use it to skim the debri that gets dislodged when replacing the filter cartridge. works like a dream. fine mesh, good construction net hasn't showed any tendency to separate.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. The head is attached securely to the handle so there is no wobble. I remove leaves from a pond and can shake it with confidence to get them off
customer_reviews.author: momofkkkkk

customer_reviews.title: Has a short handle
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a long skimmer but turns out the handle is about a foot long. But it is great at picking up tiny debris in the pool
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice short handled skimmer
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read/realize that this does not have a long handle. Wasn’t sure if we’d keep it but it actually works very nice. Very sturdy, I don’t feel like the head is going to break off when skimming through the water. Super handy! Was just surprised it was short because I must have missed that part. 🤷🏼‍♀️😉
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eastin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and handy.
customer_reviews.text: Can swim easily enough with it in hand, and grab it off the side of the pool when a bug dives in. Very easy to clean--one smack on the ground or wall clears the entire net.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good little net
customer_reviews.text: Great little net for dipping out pool while you are in it. Plastic cap on the end is a bit loose and may come off but other than that, the net and handle are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: my husband and i shopped around for an inexpensive but nice quality pool skimmer for our children's kiddie pool and we just couldn't find anything. I had hopped on to amazon for something else entirely when i decided to take a peek at what they might have. I ordered this and its perfect for our 284 gallon kiddie pool. it has a short handle that is perfect for an adult to use while standing on the outside of the pool or for an ambitious child who likes to help clean while they're in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Alum handle is suppose to be 12". It is only 9".. Not good for reach areas of spa. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Narimasu

customer_reviews.title: Decent net for hot tubs
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this net for my hot tub. It's not a big hot tub so I wanted something small. This net is the perfect size, works just fine, and the price is right. My only complaint is the net has two small holes on the top corners. The packaging was in good shape. So I believe it's a manufacturing defect. Overall a decent net for a hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Dspike

customer_reviews.title: Did what it supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK item I didn't have anything good or badd to say about it it did what it had to do
customer_reviews.author: Quortez Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware that it is a 'flat' skimmer, and does not have a basket. Very sturdy and works perfect for hot tub or small areas in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L.

customer_reviews.title: Net has no loose give like in the image
customer_reviews.text: Net has no loose give like in the image; it's firm, taut, sort of like a mini tennis racket. It'll pick stuff, but with much more effort than if the net were a bit looser, could both collect and hold onto floating debris. Will try it out for now but probably replace it with. something else
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: Broke very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very small and the net broke quickly. I would not recommend and I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This does the job to get the insect and stuff out of the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: blc

customer_reviews.title: Short Handle
customer_reviews.text: Handle very short, Im sure that I didn't read the description, if I had, I would not have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: In hindsight, probably should have ordered one with a longer handle. But like this one as is, and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT POINDEXTER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little skimmer for use when you just want to walk around the pool while in it.
customer_reviews.author: Fisette

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1/2 of it :(
customer_reviews.text: Came missing the other half so its about 2' long total. I forgot to call about this or return.. we have a pond skimer thats basically unless.
customer_reviews.author: Belt

customer_reviews.title: Great in-pool skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Although most people will use for a spa or small pool, I purchased this for our 16x35 in-ground pool. I have a large, long pole skimmer for use walking around the pool, but this one is perfect for use IN the pool while floating around. Seems well made with a thick plastic frame and substantial aluminum handle.
customer_reviews.author: James Bowdren

customer_reviews.title: In-pool net
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny net for when I'm actually in the pool. I'm 5'2 and the typical pool skimmers are too cumbersome for me. I would think if you're out of the pool, this may not be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: jessica p.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The short handle, heavy duty rim works great for scooping out debris from our hot tub (kiddie pool, mostly!).
customer_reviews.author: LHF

customer_reviews.title: This is a short handle which is nice for a smaller pool or if you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a short handle which is nice for a smaller pool or if you want to clean it while you are in it. I'm happy with it! The netting has enough give to pick up a lot of debris at once.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description says 12 feet, the actual length is 12 inches.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good little pool skimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool skimmer. Perfect for my little inflatable pool. I don't like how they sexed up the packaging, but that didn't affect my rating.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to get the little bugs out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: rdsteve23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spa
customer_reviews.text: We used it for an outdoor spa on vacation and brought it home to use it in our pool jacuzzi. Seems durable and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Deby P

customer_reviews.title: Great little skimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. Just the right size for use in the pool. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: still have it for my above ground pool you guys screwed me on ":O(
customer_reviews.author: john paxson

customer_reviews.title: It makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: The mesh in the skimmer is just perfect for my pool. It can skim up the smallest little specs out of the water and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Great for horse water troughs
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to scoop out mosquito larva,leaves, hay etc...that get into our horses water troughs. We have a small horse boarding business, and with the drought here in California, anything I can do to not waste water is important. One of my boarders told me she used to scoop gunk out of her horses water buckets with an aquarium net. Since I have a half a dozen or so water troughs I decided to get something a bit bigger. This is perfect for my 75-150 gallon water troughs, and so easy to clean. It is well made and sturdy. I won't need to dump out my troughs as often to rid us of mosquito larva..saving water!
customer_reviews.author: Fyrcat

customer_reviews.title: ... a small 10'x5'x2' inflatable pool and it is absolutely perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small 10'x5'x2' inflatable pool and it is absolutely perfect for it. I can effectively skim from the side of the pool or get in and in no time have the leaves and grass cleaned out. It seems to be durable and love the metal handle.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great for horse troughs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep horse trough clean! I keep nearby to skim hay debris out of their water. Compact size
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: good quality durable net
customer_reviews.text: Nice net durable , just wish handle was bit longer or extendable
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Peddle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans those small particles of dirt and small flying things out of the pool. So easy to use, the kids can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Tante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handle is short but my pool is only 10 feet. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: High quality pool net
customer_reviews.text: Not cheaply made like the one that came with our pool. Good for a pool that is 48" deep where it can all be reached without a long pole.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting smaller particles out of the pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting smaller particles out of the pool. The screen is a finer mesh that most others. Works good and held up all summer. Used it daily in our pool before swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh is not as fine as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: Overall, does its job. Mesh is not as fine as I would have liked, but I should have searched more specifically for a fine mesh net. Size is perfect for my inflatable pool and is easy for my kids to use as well. White cap at the end of handle falls off constantly and is a bit annoying, but does not interfere with functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick clean up while you are in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick clean up while you are in the pool. Used it all summer and it is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: SocalLiving

customer_reviews.title: For small pools only
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but it does what it's supposed to do. Just don't use it as a tennis racket as my wife did.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did(after reading other reviews) was glue the end on the handle. I love the net and would recommend. I use it in our swimming pool to gather small things on the top of the water.
customer_reviews.author: 1Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this handy skimmer...We bought it for our 12 ft by 30 inch steel frame pool. Works great and pretty sturdy...
customer_reviews.author: JoCi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: The white end tip came off immediately, which means the metal digs into your hand with each sweep through the water...SMH
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: The skimmer handle is ONE foot long, not 12 feet.
customer_reviews.text: I think Amazon should correct the description for this product. It clearly stated that the skimmer had a 12-foot aluminum handle. Apparently, someone doesn't know the difference between a foot and an inch. I guess the picture should have given it away, but when one is comparing many different products, it was easy to miss.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Too SHORT
customer_reviews.text: The handle is only 12 “ long Stupid design and rip off compared others with longer handle For similiar price
customer_reviews.author: jlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they work great for cleaning out my horse water tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Don Selph

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works well for hot tub. We are not hard on it so can't attest to its sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spisak

customer_reviews.title: The size is good for the small pool I have for my niece ...
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving a 3 star solely because his arrived without the end cap. I haven't used it yet so may adjust once I see how it function. The size is good for the small pool I have for my niece but the end is sharp. Will look to a chair or pipe cap to cover it with.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Volz

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This net is just right for a small 8 ft round kids pool. The aluminum handle makes it sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Martha I Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is fine if you just want a little net
customer_reviews.text: It is fine if you just want a little net. No pole or anything else came with package. It also does not have holes to attach it to a pole.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday to skim the top of my horses water 💦 buckets , it’s awesome to have because it’s small ! It does the job and fits in small places to store !
customer_reviews.author: DanniRuzzano

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! But the box was smashed up. It had been through hell from the looks off it. The other item; bottle of chlorine in the box was all dented...
customer_reviews.author: Raiya

product_meta.title: HydroTools by Swimline Aluminum Handle Pool and Spa Skimmer
product_meta.description:
Swimline is a family owned and operated business founded in 1971 and is the leading manufacturer of high quality pool products. At its inception, Swimline was the largest manufacturer of in-ground and above-ground pool liners, covers, and all related accessories. In 1990, Swimline founded International Leisure Products, which expanded the product line to pool toys, games, fun floats and accessories. With this vast array of pool products, Swimline continued to deliver on the needs of its reputable business partners to provide quality products. Four years later, in 1994, Swimline acquired United Leisure Industries HydroTools , which allowed the company to manufacture traditional pool accessories such as leaf skimmers, pool filters, and a wide range of maintenance equipment to keep pools in top shape. HydroTools furthers our commitment to supplying quality products to the pool trade.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is a premium aluminum handle spa skimmer head.
feature_bullets: Ideal for use in small pools and spas
Ideal for skimming leaves, insects as well as other trash from surface of water
